Created attachment 28803
SVG with arc not drawn by batik

I have a case where an elliptical arc path element is not drawn at all by batik. 

Here is the SVG code (see also attachment for the complete SVG file):

<path fill="none" d="M83.5,431.40 A15.95,15.95 0 0 1 98.20,400.35" stroke-width="5" stroke="rgb(255,0,0)"/>


However, if I change the coordinate 431.40 to 431.401 the arc appears. 

Adobe SVG Viewer displays the arc correctly.

Please help!

The content is actually pushing the SVG spec because the given Radius for the arc is quite a bit short (about 20%) of that required.  It appears that when we scale it up we cut it a little too close and it must fail some check later on, I gave ourself a little more padding.

Fixed in rev: 1340064
